subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Harvey Updyke Jr., the man accused of poisoning the oak trees at Auburn’s Toomer’s Corner, where fans have long celebrated big victories, was indicted by a grand jury in Opelika, Ala.
snippet: Harvey Updyke Jr., the man accused of poisoning the oak trees at Auburn’s Toomer’s Corner, where fans have long celebrated big victories, was indicted by a grand jury in Opelika, Ala.
